title: How to Make a Fruit Slush

steps.headline: Purée fruit with sugar and lime juice until smooth.
steps.description: Use a blender to do this.

steps.headline: Add the fruit mixture and water to a large pitcher.
Cover and refrigerate for up to a week.
Stir well and pour into tall glasses over ice to serve.

text: Purée fruit with sugar and lime juice until smooth. Use a blender to do this. Add the fruit mixture and water to a large pitcher. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate for up to a week.  Stir well and pour into tall glasses over ice to serve.  Finished.
